title: BRIEF-Insurance Australia Group Agrees Sale Of 26% Interest In SBI General
text:
BRIEF-Insurance Australia Group Agrees Sale Of 26% Interest In SBI General

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 17, 2019 03:12)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Insurance Australia Group Agrees Sale Of 26% Interest In SBI General Oct 17 (Reuters) - Insurance Australia Group Ltd : * AGREES SALE OF 26% INTEREST IN SBI (NS: ) GENERAL * TOTAL CONSIDERATION AMOUNTS TO OVER $640 MILLION * TRANSACTIONS ARE EXPECTED TO COMPLETE DURING IAG'S FINANCIAL YEAR ENDING 30 JUNE 2020 * INSURANCE AUSTRALIA GROUP- AGREED TO SELL WHOLE OF ITS 26% INTEREST IN ITS JV WITH STATE BANK OF INDIA, SBI GENERAL INSURANCE COMPANY (SBI GENERAL) * NAPEAN OPPORTUNITIES LLP TO ACQUIRE A 16.01% INTEREST * AN AFFILIATE OF WARBURG PINCUS LLC TO ACQUIRE A 9.99% INTEREST IN SBI * TRANSACTIONS IS EXPECTED TO RESULT IN AN INCREASE IN IAG'S REGULATORY CAPITAL POSITION OF MORE THAN $400 MILLION IN FY20 * TRANSACTION EXPECTED TO RESULT IN AN INCREASE IN IAG'S REGULATORY CAPITAL POSITION OF MORE THAN $400 MILLION * ON DEALS COMPLETION, EXPECTED TO INCREASE CO'S REGULATORY CAPITAL POSITION OF MORE THAN $400 MILLION, NPAT OVER $300 MILLION TO BE RECOGNISED IN FY20 * AGREES SALE OF 26% INTEREST IN SBI GENERAL

BRIEF-Insurance Australia Group Agrees Sale Of 26% Interest In SBI General
description: BRIEF-Insurance Australia Group Agrees Sale Of 26% Interest In SBI General
